text.p: These are the leading stories in the Algerian press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Political parties start preparations for parliamentary elections planned for the first half of this year.
- Algeria makes a breakthrough in the European gas market after the inauguration of a $1.9 billion pipeline carrying natural gas from southern Algerian to Portugal.
- At least five political parties hold meetings to prepare for the poll.
